column4: If i am to have a windows partition on my hdd whilst having ubuntu, then how is it best to set it up ? First to install windows ? How should the partitioning be ?
best to install m$ first then ubuntu
for partitioning you can let m$ set up its xGB and then when finish boot ubuintu cd and install ubuntu on free space
swap around 5oomb or so some say twice ram but these days thats a bit overboard
